sentences.en: He is very insightful, he saw the talent in that student.
sentences.cn: 他独具慧眼, 发现了这个有天分的学生.
有眼光的人作选择时总很细心.

sentences.en: She offered some really interesting, insightful observations.
sentences.cn: 她给出了一些非常有趣又富有洞察力的评论。

sentences.en: Thank you for this insightful column and action for the climate.
sentences.cn: 感谢你为这个富有洞察力的专栏及气候变化所做出的努力.

sentences.en: The chapter is insightful and suggestive of new perspectives.
sentences.cn: 这一章见解深刻且有新观点.

sentences.en: The third: the boss collision with insightful people.
sentences.cn: 第三种: 可以与老板碰撞产生真知灼见的人.

sentences.en: There has been no shortage of insightful analyses in the press.
sentences.cn: 报章不乏精辟的分析见解.

sentences.en: They have a reputation for being intuitive and insightful.
sentences.cn: 他们既有敏锐的洞察力,又有深刻的见解.

sentences.en: They're extremely insightful, and see things that are not obvious to others.
sentences.cn: 他们极其富有洞察力, 可以看到那些对于其他人来说并非显而易见的事情.

sentences.en: This article is very insightful and worth checking out.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章是非常有见地和价值检查.

sentences.en: This is not an insightful article. It's all just filler , really.
sentences.cn: 这不是一篇很有见地的文章. 只是一篇补白, 仅此而已.

sentences.en: Without the column, insightful big space, steel roof frame.
sentences.cn: 为一层无柱通透大空间, 钢屋架,砖墙.

trans.tran_cn: 富有洞察力的，有深刻见解的
trans.tran_en: able to understand, or showing that you understand, what a situation or person is really like
